title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command in the given scenario, the text does not move as expected.
EB: The text should move when the ShiftLeft command is executed. In this case, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). There should not be any confusion or unexpected behavior when a stray space is present.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually.
2. Execute the ShiftLeft command.

The text should not move as expected, causing confusion when a stray space is present. The expected behavior is to have the second line shifted left and the first line shifted left at least to the space character.
